text.div: A physical quantity interval boundary containing an inclusive/exclusive flag.

name: IVXB_PQ
title: IVXB_PQ: Interval Boundary PhysicalQuantity (V3 Data Type)
description: A physical quantity interval boundary containing an inclusive/exclusive flag.

element.short: Base for all types and resources
element.definition: A physical quantity interval boundary containing an inclusive/exclusive flag.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children

element.label: Exceptional Value Detail
element.definition: If a value is an exceptional value (NULL-value), this specifies in what way and why proper information is missing.

element.label: Unit of Measure
element.definition: The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) [].

element.label: Maginitude Value
element.definition: The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit.

element.label: Translation
element.definition: An alternative representation of the same physical quantity expressed in a different unit, of a different unit code system and possibly with a different value.
Specifies whether the limit is included in the interval (interval is closed) or excluded from the interval (interval is open).
A physical quantity interval boundary containing an inclusive/exclusive flag.
Specifies whether the limit is included in the interval (interval is closed) or excluded from the interval (interval is open).
